name: Watcher_Add
author: THA-CERT // YNE
description: Add domain to Watcher. Required tags: watcher:module=LegitDomain|WebsiteMonitoring. For LegitDomain: watcher:repurchased=Yes/No (required), watcher:contact=email (optional). For WebsiteMonitoring: watcher:legitimacy=2-6 (required), watcher:takedown_request=Yes/No, watcher:legal_team=Yes/No, watcher:blocking_request=Yes/No

configurationItems.name: watcher_api_key
configurationItems.description: API key for authenticating requests to Watcher

configurationItems.name: the_hive_custom_field
configurationItems.description: Custom field name for ticket ID
